price: [Dios sabe cuando Lo invocas] diciendo: "¡Oh, Señor! Este es un pueblo que no cree".
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
